    UK Driving Test Centres Passing Rates

      Between April 2023 and September 2023, a total of 865,703 exams were conducted across the UK, with an average pass rate of 48.8%. During this period, 50% of all male applicants successfully obtained their driving license after completing the test.

      Explore our extensive range of driving test centers situated across the UK. From Aberdeen North to Yeovil, our list encompasses various testing facilities. Locate the nearest center to you and prepare for your driving journey with confidence.
